skillTree.name: Fury of Da Prophet!
skillTree.description: Those on the wrong side of Wurrzag find themselves blasted apart by his magic or, worse, turned into Squigs!

effects.description: Enables magical attacks
Strips enemies of any magic resistance they may have!

skillTree.name: Savage Riders
skillTree.description: These Savage Orcs, and the Warboars that bear them, give no quarter on the battlefield.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Savage Orc cavalry units
Charge bonus: +10% for Savage Orc cavalry units

skillTree.name: Real Savage Boyz
skillTree.description: No need for 'smarts' or thinkin' like a Goblin. Just smash 'em harder; that's the Orc-y way!

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Savage Orc units
Charge bonus: +12 for Savage Orc units

skillTree.name: Spleenrippa
skillTree.description: A gift to Wurrzag from the Iron Pig tribe, Spleenrippa is his dependable, and terrifying, War Boar mount.

effects.description: Mount: Spleenrippa

skillTree.name: Tunnel Boss
skillTree.description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description: Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles

skillTree.name: Bellower
skillTree.description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.name: Wild Feet!
skillTree.description: Fighting Wurrzag is relatively disconcerting. His feet stamp out the wild of rhythm of the Savage Orcs as he jigs in and out of the fight.

effects.description: Speed: +25%
Melee defence: +15
Attribute: Perfect Vigour

skillTree.name: Colossal Warpaint
skillTree.description: While locating enough paint for the job ain't easy, no one can deny the results!

effects.description: Physical resistance: 20% for Trolls, Giant, Arachnarok Spider and Rogue Idol units
Physical resistance: 5%

skillTree.name: Titanic Beat!
skillTree.description: Wurrzag's feet move to a rhythm only he can hear, but he's more than happy to share!

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +20% when increasing
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"
Spell: "Brain Bursta"
Spell: "Gaze of Mork"

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description: Unit experience gain per turn: +75
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.name: Da Gobbos
skillTree.description: Orcs may be stronger, but Goblins are smarter, nastier, and better-er.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
Ammunition: +10% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units

skillTree.name: Riderz
skillTree.description: Greenskin cavalry can be devastating if the myriad mounts can behave. Getting a big stick and maybe a "carrot" in the form of an orange-painted gobbo is the answer!

effects.description: Speed: +6% for melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units
Speed: +9% for melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units

skillTree.name: Da Boyz
skillTree.description: This Boss is one with "da boyz", egging the lads on to greater feats and to hit bigga stuff with their choppas.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Orc infantry units
Base missile damage: +4% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units

skillTree.name: ‘Ard as Nailz
skillTree.description: Ridin’ on chariots means ya can be even more fighty, an' even more killy!

effects.description: Armour: +4 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units

skillTree.name: Da Big Ladz
skillTree.description: Even bigga than a Black Orc, an' not bad at killin’ too!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Trolls, Giant, and Arachnarok Spider units
Melee attack: +4 for Trolls, Giant, and Arachnarok Spider units

Weapon strength: +12% for Trolls, Giant, and Arachnarok Spider units

skillTree.name: Deff From Abuv
skillTree.description: This Boss realises the power of "flyin’ fings” and so invests a few teef in making sure his war machines can fling fings really far and really high!

effects.description: Ammunition: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units

Missile strength: +8% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
Ability: "Get Back 'Ere!"

skillTree.name: Sneaky Stabberz
skillTree.description: The sneakiest and stabbiest gobboes are just as dangerous as the largest, fiercest Orcs.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Goblin, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Goblin, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 10% for Goblin, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: 'Ard Ladz
skillTree.description: ‘Ardest of da ‘Ard. Don’t mess, gottit?

effects.description: Armour: +12 for Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
Ward save: 8% for Orc units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Biggest ‘n' Strongest
skillTree.description: It’s one fing to be big, but quite anuva to be strong as well!

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Trolls, Giant, and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Trolls, Giant, and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Trolls, Giant, and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Savage Smartz
skillTree.description: Nuffin' smashes harder than a rock fallin' from da sky, except mebbe da Bad Moon, if it were to fall.

effects.description: Ammunition: +20% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +12% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
Reload time reduction: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
Replaces: "Get Back 'Ere!"
Ability: "Smash 'Em Faster"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.name: Deff From Below
skillTree.description: A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +6%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +16%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +30%

skillTree.name: Raider
skillTree.description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

effects.description: Income from raiding: +10%
Income from raiding: +20%
Income from raiding: +30%

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

effects.description: Income from looting settlements: +3%
Income from looting settlements: +8%
Income from looting settlements: +15%

skillTree.name: Ravager
skillTree.description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

effects.description: Income from sacking settlements: +3%
Income from sacking settlements: +8%
Income from sacking settlements: +15%

skillTree.name: Iron-Hard
skillTree.description: These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
Wound recovery time: -1

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enemy battle reinforcement time: +25%
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +50%

skillTree.name: Out-Clevering
skillTree.description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.

effects.description: Ambush success chance: +6%
Ambush success chance: +16%
Ambush success chance: +30%

skillTree.name: Mob Boss
skillTree.description: A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.

effects.description: Upkeep: -3%
Upkeep: -6%
Upkeep: -9%

skillTree.name: Really Green
skillTree.description: Being green meanz ya really mean.

effects.description: Corruption: -1
Corruption: -2
Corruption: -3

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

skillTree.name: Da Great Green Prophet
skillTree.description: “Da Godz speak ta me. Listen, and I’ll tell ya.”

effects.description: Upkeep: -50% for Savage Orc units
Recruitment cost: -50% for Savage Orc units
